name: LAB.AR
description:
Dr. Robert O`Neil gets his job as a genetic in the cancer research center. He worked there before and knows its director Howard Deus.

Howard Deus died by the mystical circumstances. He was a renowned scientist in the fields of physics, biology and robotics. He created various androids, but did not succeed in developing the cure for his daughter cancer.

Help Robert to get used to his new job, explore the research complex, meet with the local personnel and solve the logic puzzles to reveal what is really happened to the renowned scientist.

Features:
* Narrative sci-fi horror.
* Intriguing dialogue, rich story.
* Quest, logical and other puzzles.
* Mouse and keyboard control.
* Pixel arts.
* Atmospheric OST.
